about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am a traditional doctor(healer). I can provide you medicinal herbs.I can also provide mindbody therapy. And provide spiritual healing using quran.

services.body_1: I can cure patients' with diseases such as stomach aches, asthma, cancer, skin diseases, headaches and more using herbs.
services.body_2: I can cure of possess by jinn(spirits) and diseases such as evil eyes by using The Holy Qur'an.In Sha Allah(if Allah wills) you can be healed.
